title: Mississauga
summary: Mississauga (/ˌmɪsɪˈsɑːɡə/ (listen) mih-sih-SAW-gə)[3] is a city in the Canadian province of Ontario. It is situated on the shores of Lake Ontario in the Regional Municipality of Peel, bordering Toronto to the east. With a population of 721,599 as of the 2016 census, Mississauga is the sixth-most populous municipality in Canada, third-most in Ontario, and second-most in the Greater Toronto Area.[1][4]
